gist.headline: Decoding the buzz
gist.blurb: Even the best bees get lost sometimes. We've added a map for when the API says 'no', so you can get back to building.
gist.summary: Added comprehensive examples and handling guidance for common API error codes (401, 403, 429, 400) to the documentation.
gist.impact: Developers can now debug integration issues faster with clear explanations of failure states.
gist.visual_concept: The Nomnom creature consuming error logs (turning negatives into positives/knowledge), while the Bee reads the manual. Represents understanding errors.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the round nomnom creature happily eating a stack of papers labeled '404' and '429'. The bee mascot hovers nearby reading a tiny guidebook. Lime green (#ecf874) and lavender soft gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley.
